form.text: TEXT: Over 500 Prizes To Be Awarded
form.label: question

form.text: Now you can win up $ 5,000 for simply picking the winners of the games listed below. Just check the box next to the team you think will win. Allow for the point spread in your selections. (For example, if a team is quoted as +7 pts. this means they must win the game by at least 7 points.) Prizes will be awarded by random drawings to those who have the greatest official number of winning selections. Full details are in the Rules.
